Value.Body: Welcome.[br][br]This wizard will help you in Zappiti configuration.[br][br]Click the "Where are your files" button to tell Zappiti where your media files are (Movies, TV Shows, Music).

Value.Name: Add a local folder
Value.Description: -Internal hard drive of this computer [br] - external hard drive connected via USB / eSata to this computer [br] - HDD in a docking station connected to the computer in USB / eSata [br] - connected media player in USB Slave to this computer

Value.Name: Add a shared network folder
Value.Description: -Internal of your multimedia player HDD connected [br]-external hard drive connected networked [br] - Server NAS [br] - another remote computer connected to the network [br] - shared network [br] folder - disk network hard
Value.Tips: Tips: You can buy USB hard drives, NAS, etc. on HD LAND website.

Value.Body: Select one of the options below to indicate where your media files are.
Drag and drop the folders you want to add to the list on the right.

Value.Header: Do you want to add another location?

Value.Body: Choose the location of this folder to access it from your Media Player: [br](indiquez où ce dossier sera placé àle final)
Value.ExternLabel: On an external hard drive connected to the media player
Value.NetworkLabel: On a NAS server, network folder or a shared hard drive of this PC
Value.InternLabel: On an internal hard drive media player

Value.Body: This folder must be shared on your network to allow access for your Dune.
Value.IAccept: I agree to share this folder.

Value.Body: Enable the local server for: [br] - launch videos on your PC by Zappiti Media Control.[br] - stream your videos from your PC to Zappiti Media Controlregardless of the place where you use it.
Value.ServerIsRunning: The server is running on port {0}
Value.CheckServerFromCloud: Check the communication with the outside world.
Value.Warning: You can stream multiple videos simultaneously, but the power of your computer and the speed of your bandwidth may affect the quality of the streaming.
Value.StartServerFailed: Unable to launch the local server. Try with another port.
Value.HelpLabel: Click on the link below to get help:

Value.SendToCloud: Enable automatic synchronization via Zappiti Cloud.
Value.RefreshText: Use only if something is poorly spent previously.[br]This action allows you to synchronize your entire database.[br]This can be quite long depending on the size of your database.
Value.SyncText: Control your music and videos with your tablet or smartphone.

Value.Body: Your Zappiti username can be associated with 3 computers.[BR][BR]Past this limit, you can "Forget your computers" to associate new computer to your account.[BR][BR]You can "Forget your computers" up to 2 times on 6 month.
Value.TooMuchReset: You have reached the limit number of computer resets for this period.

Value.Header: Do you have a Zappiti Player?
Value.Tips: This code is generally present on your invoice or packing of your Zappiti Player. If you can't find it, contact your dealer to get it.
Value.ActivateBody: Enter your activation (Zappiti Player Token) code below to activate your Zappiti Player.
Value.TooMuchTry: You do too much testing infructieux. Please try again by 24 hours.
Value.TokenAlreadyInUse: This activation code is already used by another account. He must be released from this another account before reuse.
Value.NotFound: This activation code does not exist.
Value.BadLicence: An error occurred while retrieving your user license.

Value.YourTokens: Here is the list of activation codes associated with your account. You can release them for reuse with another account. You will receive a confirmation email.
Value.Body: Enter your activation code (Zappiti Player Token) ci below to activate your Zappiti Player.
Value.Congratulation: Felication, your activation code was recorded.
